# seoulsurvey

The goal of seoulsurvey is to provide data from seoul survey [this link](Data From Seoul Survey Urban Policy Index Survey)

## Installation

You can install the developing version of seoulsurvey from [github](https://github.com/mrchypark/seoulsurvey) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("mrchypark/seoulsurvey")
```
